description: A batteries-included SQL query & schema builder for Postgres, MySQL and SQLite3 and the Browser

name: knex

scripts.db:start: docker-compose -f scripts/docker-compose.yml up --build -d mysql oracledbxe postgres mssql; docker-compose -f scripts/docker-compose.yml up initmssqlknexdb waitmysql waitpostgres waitoracledbxe
scripts.stress:init: docker-compose -f scripts/stress-test/docker-compose.yml up --no-start && docker-compose -f scripts/stress-test/docker-compose.yml start
scripts.test: mocha --exit -t 10000 test/index.js && npm run test:tape && npm run test:cli
scripts.test:nyc: nyc mocha --exit --check-leaks --globals __core-js_shared__ -t 10000 test/index.js && npm run test:tape && npm run test:cli
